author: Viet Tran
comment: From what I'm gathering there's supposed to be configurable settings for this watch face? I'm unable to see them on my G Watch through the watch or android wear app. Otherwise it's a beautiful face that's the perfect balance of digital and analog.
title: Missing some settings on G Watch?

author: Erik Bosman
comment: I love this concept. More cusomization would be nice.   * 24Hr support (digital) * color changes * black background * Bold text?   Apart from that - Great! also on the square G watch! :)
title: Nice!

author: Andrew McLaughlin
comment: Only shows 1 face. Where are the others displayed in the photos.
title: Not as described.

author: Zach Champion
comment: Only thing missing is the ability to change the arrow color, show the battery %, and a full black and white ambient mode. Other than that its amazing! Battery life is awesome too!
title: Great

author: Geron Phillips
comment: In the UK, Monday is the first day of the week. Not being able to change that is a deal breaker for me
title: Good idea

author: Chris Fell
comment: Excellent watch face, people always ask why only one hand. Unfortunately I am ex military and 24 hour is a must! So even though I think it is fun and gets people talking I don't use it as much as I would like.
title: Brilliant

author: Jeff Snyder
comment: There is only one face. The one that looks like a traditional watch. Each section, that on first glace looks like 15 minutes,  represents a day of the week and then the relative time within that section. So 12:02 would be Sunday at around noon.
title: OK, I get it

author: Axel Örn Sigurðsson
comment: I'm happy with it, except that I'd want to see a 24h mode before I can really use it. It's a 5 star watch face to me if 24h option is added.
title: Looks really good

author: Sarah Rosamond
comment: Whoever made this is a genius! Such a simple but elegant watch face and love that it shows you where you are in the week and not just the time! Stylin and profilin....love always, Prof. Dickweed

author: Ivy A Nguyen
comment: Where do I change the face options for this watch face? I see it on the default digital clock face, with no menu selection on either watch or phone to switch. What's going on?
title: Missing settings/configuration menu

author: Elliott Bernard-Cooper
comment: I'd like to be able to set the face to have the week start at Monday instead of Sunday, but other than this, it looks and functions great.
title: Great watch face

author: Nick Scarantino
comment: the date is too faint on the dim watch and makes it impossible to see.
title: can't read the date

author: Fred Thomas IV
comment: No customization what so ever
title: Missing a lot of options

author: B Bell
comment: Was hoping to like it because heard good things but it would freeze up.

author: Mustafa Ali
comment: Love the clean design and attention to detail.
title: Best watchface I've used till date!

author: Daniel Aldred
comment: I cannot change any settings I am stuck with no settings so I can't customise the watch face
title: Can't change any settings

author: Dinico Win
comment: Material design settings menu on both phone and watch
title: Wayyy 2 clean

author: Jacob Seifert
comment: Unfortunately there's no 24h option yet.
title: Well designed

author: Drew Hanshaw
comment: Awesome looking slick face for my huawei watch
title: Great

author: perry farmer
comment: No menu.
title: No menu on Moto?

author: Justin Beck Holmes
comment: Amazing watch face

author: Jim Wise
comment: Leads you to believe there are settings, yet doesn't have any.
title: Missing settings

author: Will Bresnahan
comment: This is a great watch face. I just wish that it had an ambient mode.
title: Great watch face

author: Christian Roston
comment: Minimal, simple, and excellent idea!
title: Brilliant concept!
